mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD(BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, BRDMEMO, BRDDATE, BRDHIT, BRDDELETEFLAG) VALUES (#{brdtitle}, #{brdwriter}, #{brdmemo}, NOW(), 0, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY BRDNO DESC
SELECT BRDNO, BRDTITLE, BRDMEMO, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BRDDATE FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDNO = #{brdno} AND BRDDELETEFLAG = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N'
